name: Break It Down (SkyanSam)
description:
Objects that spawn in the game move towards eachother eventually forming connections. Your goal is to break these connections before the objects eventually collide. Don't touch the objects or allow the objects to touch eachother, else you'll lose.

Controls Mouse Controls
Player Movement
WASD / Arrow Keys
Player MovementM Key
Switch Between Mouse Controls and WASD
Credits SkyanSam (Code & Game Design) Lightspeed6 (Music)
